column2: Are you sure you want to unlock the research slot?
Replace this Star God to this analysis center?
column4: 是否將此星神更換到此分析中心？

column2:
- The research center has a career and power analysis center
- Place the Star God in the center for analysis and gain instant attribute bonuses
- The attribute bonus of the analysis center will increase the attribute percentage of all star gods on the formation.
- When the star god's profession or power is consistent with the designated analysis center, the percentage of attributes improved by the analysis center will be doubled
column4:
- The research center has a profession and power analysis center
- Place the Star God in the center for analysis and gain instant attribute bonuses
- The attribute bonus of the analysis center will increase the attribute percentage of all star gods on the formation.
- When the star god's occupation or power is consistent with the designated analysis center, the attribute percentage increased by the analysis center will be doubled

是否確認重置此技能？

column2: Attributes take effect on all characters in battle
column4: 屬性對所有上陣角色生效

column2:
Explanation
- Star soul combination can be activated by consuming star soul.
- Each time a combination is activated, the attribute bonus corresponding to the combination can be obtained.
- After the star gathering degree reaches a certain value, the star gathering skill can be activated.
- Skills will take effect directly during combat.
- Star soul combination and star gathering skills can be reset. After resetting, all consumed Star Souls and Evil-Breaking Crystals will be returned.
column4:
illustrate
- Star soul combination can be activated by consuming star soul.
- Each time a combination is activated, the attribute bonus corresponding to the combination can be obtained.
- After the star gathering degree reaches a certain value, the star gathering skill can be activated.
- Skills will take effect directly during combat.
- Star soul combination and star gathering skills can be reset. After resetting, all consumed Star Souls and Evil-Breaking Crystals will be returned.
